mapper.select: SELECT CALENDAR_ID, USER_CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, CALENDAR_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS START_DATETIME, TO_CHAR(END_DATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS END_DATETIME FROM v_active_calendar WHERE (USER_CODE = #{userCode} OR CALENDAR_TYPE = 'HOLIDAY') ORDER BY START_DATETIME ASC

SELECT CALENDAR_ID, USER_CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, CALENDAR_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS START_DATETIME, TO_CHAR(END_DATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS END_DATETIME FROM calendar WHERE CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId} AND STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar ( calendar_id, user_code, title, content, start_datetime, end_datetime, calendar_type, status ) VALUES ( seq_calendar_id.NEXTVAL, #{user_code}, #{title}, #{content}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), TO_TIMESTAMP(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), #{calendar_type}, 'ACTIVE' )
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, start_datetime = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), end_datetime = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE calendar_id = #{calendar_id} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
UPDATE calendar SET status = 'DELETED', deleted_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE calendar_id = #{calendar_id}
